thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: John Kelly Orders End to Some Interim Security Clearances

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: John Kelly Orders End to Some Interim Security Clearances
text:
WASHINGTON—The White House next week will discontinue interim security clearances for some of its staffers, one of several changes Chief of Staff John Kelly proposed Friday in the wake of news that a top lieutenant held the temporary status for more than a year despite allegations of domestic abuse.
There are multiple senior aides in the White House with interim clearance, including Jared Kushner, the president’s son-in-law who has served as a senior adviser since the beginning of the administration.
...
